name: Indira Praveena T

education.field:
Computer Science and Engineering
Specialisation in Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning

summary: A dedicated and tech-savvy student with a passion for Web Development, AI/ML, and Data Analytics. Experienced in developing innovative solutions through hands-on projects. Proficient in API development and focused on data privacy techniques, including federated learning and differential privacy.

projects.name: CONSUME WISE
projects.description:
Product Health Analysis Application
Application where users enter product names to receive a detailed health analysis based on data processing and AI algorithms. Interpret product data and provide health insights, leveraging techniques such as machine learning.

projects.name: TALENT HUB
projects.description:
Talent Management Website
Web platform designed to connect skilled individuals with people, facilitating talent discovery and entertainment. Designed and integrated an intuitive interface for users to post their intrests.

projects.name: WASTE WISE CONNECT
projects.description:
Waste Segregation ML Model
Machine learning model designed to assist users in segregating waste by identifying different types, such as degradable, plastic, and recyclable materials. Implemented image recognition techniques to analyze and classify waste items using computer vision algorithms.

name: Ajay Nayak G

education.institution: M S Ramaiah Institute of Technology (MSRIT)

summary: Dedicated and detail-oriented ISE student with a strong focus on problem-solving, logical thinking, and optimizing systems for maximum efficiency. Currently learning full-stack development, with hands-on experience in MERN Stack (MongoDB, Express.js, React, Node.js), Socket.io, and data structures.
certifications: How to Build Your Own ChatBot using Python? (Great Learning)
Master Cognitive Biases and Improve Your Critical Thinking (Udemy)

projects.name: ChatApp using MERN stack
projects.description: A real time chat application built with the MERN stack, featuring instant messaging, online status tracking, and media uploads.

projects.name: Movie Explorer
projects.description:
MovieExplorer is a web app that helps users search for movies, explore trending titles, and view detailed information like genres, ratings, and release dates. It offers an easy-to-use interface for discovering and learning more about your favourite films.
Developed a dynamic web-based application for searching and exploring trending and popular movies.
Implemented a Trie data structure for efficient autocomplete search.
Integrated The Movie Database (TMDb) API to fetch real-time movie details.
Optimized search performance by storing trending movies in a Trie for faster access.

projects.name: Algorithm Playground
projects.description:
The Algorithm Playground is an interactive platform featuring multiple algorithm visualizations, including sorting, searching, and pathfinding algorithms. Users can engage with each algorithm step-by-step, observing real-time execution and transitions. The platform aims to simplify complex concepts and enhance learning through visual and interactive experiences.
Developed interactive visualizations for various algorithms, including sorting, searching, and pathfinding, using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
Worked on the frontend to create responsive, user-friendly interfaces and helped with backend integration for real-time algorithm execution.
Implemented event-driven programming for user interaction, enabling step-by-step control of algorithms.
Focused on problem-solving to break down complex algorithms and make them accessible for educational purposes.

raw_text:
Ajay Nayak G
• +91 7022874879 •  
LinkedIn   
GitHub    
Summary
Dedicated and detail-oriented ISE student with a strong focus on problem-solving, logical thinking, and optimizing systems for maximum efficiency. Currently learning full-stack development, with hands-on experience in MERN Stack (MongoDB, Express.js, React, Node.js), Socket.io, and data structures. Proficient in Java, Python, and C.
Beyond coding, I bring the discipline of a karate black belt, the strategic thinking of a former football team captain, the leadership experience of a band major, and the creative problem-solving mindset of an artist. Passionate about building impactful solutions and continuously improving technical skills. Strong interest in business and entrepreneurship, aiming to create scalable, user-centric applications that solve real-world challenges. Known for an adaptable mindset, trust, honesty, and the ability to approach challenges with a unique perspective, ensuring high-quality results in every project.
Education
Current – 3rd Year
Information Science Engineering (ISE) | M S Ramaiah Institute of Technology (MSRIT)
CGPA - 9.06 GPA 
12th
PCMC (Science) | Jain Heritage School
Percentage - 93%
10th 
Jain Heritage School
Percentage - 88%
Projects
ChatApp using MERN stack

A real time chat application built with the MERN stack, featuring instant messaging, online status tracking, and media uploads.
Tech Stack: Node.js, Vite, React, Express, MongoDB, Mongoose, Socket.io, TailwindCSS
Authentication: JWT, bcrypt, cookie-parser
Media Handling: Cloudinary integration
API Testing: Postman
Error Handling: Implemented on both frontend and backend
Projects
Movie Explorer
DEC 2024 - JAN 2025


MovieExplorer is a web app that helps users search for movies, explore trending titles, and view detailed information like genres, ratings, and release dates. It offers an easy-to-use interface for discovering and learning more about your favourite films.
Developed a dynamic web-based application for searching and exploring trending and popular movies.
Implemented a Trie data structure for efficient autocomplete search.
Integrated The Movie Database (TMDb) API to fetch real-time movie details.
Optimized search performance by storing trending movies in a Trie for faster access.



Algorithm Playground
Oct 2024 - Jan 2025


The Algorithm Playground is an interactive platform featuring multiple algorithm visualizations, including sorting, searching, and pathfinding algorithms. Users can engage with each algorithm step-by-step, observing real-time execution and transitions. The platform aims to simplify complex concepts and enhance learning through visual and interactive experiences.
Developed interactive visualizations for various algorithms, including sorting, searching, and pathfinding, using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
Worked on the frontend to create responsive, user-friendly interfaces and helped with backend integration for real-time algorithm execution.
Implemented event-driven programming for user interaction, enabling step-by-step control of algorithms.
Focused on problem-solving to break down complex algorithms and make them accessible for educational purposes.

Skills (Technical)
Algorithm, API, API Integration, API Testing, CSS, Data Structures, Debugging, Express.js, Git, GitHub, HTML, JavaScript, JWT, MongoDB, Mongoose, Node.js, Postman, Socket.io, System Testing, TailwindCSS, WebSockets, Java, Java 17, OOPS, Python, C, Flutter, Vite, React, Dotenv, Bcrypt, Cookie-Parser, Cloudinary.
Licenses and Certifications
Algorithms Part-1 (Coursera)
Algorithms Part-2 (Coursera)
Web Developer Bootcamp — Current (Udemy)
Java Masterclass — Current (Udemy)
How to Build Your Own ChatBot using Python? (Great Learning)
Master Cognitive Biases and Improve Your Critical Thinking (Udemy)

Key Achievements
SAP Hackathon
Being shortlisted among the top projects in the SAP Hackathon showcases our ability to develop innovative solutions under pressure. The project focused on localization—leveraging resources from the nearby community to enhance efficiency. While it didn’t make it to the final round, it demonstrated our critical thinking, strong ideation, and teamwork. We successfully developed the frontend, further refining our technical and collaborative skills.

Strengths
Attitude over Skill mindset
Curiousness
Calm under Pressure
Problem Solving -Passionate about finding unconventional yet effective solutions to complex challenges.


Personal Achievements & Extracurricular Activities

MMA Fighter and Karate Black Belt – Trained in mixed martial arts, Achieved black belt level, demonstrating discipline and perseverance.
Sketch Artist – Skilled in detailed artwork and creative illustration.
Ex-Football Team Captain – Led the school football team, developing leadership and teamwork skills.
Band Major in School – Directed and coordinated the school band, showcasing leadership and discipline.

name: Ankit Raj
summary: Passionate about Machine Learning, with a strong leadership background as Vice Chairman of ACM. I thrive on solving complex problems, leading teams, and driving innovation. Always eager to learn and grow in tech!
certifications: SE Certificate from NPTEL, IIT Kharagpur, showcasing expertise in software development, agile practices, and key engineering concepts.

projects.name: Text to Image Generator
projects.description: Developed a text-to-image generation project using Stable Diﬀusion and GPT-2, focusing on model optimization, eﬃciency, and applications in creative AI

projects.name: Automatic mistakes detection and corrections in variable declarations of C language
projects.description: Developed an AI-powered system for automatic mistake detection and correction in C variable declarations, using machine learning, static analysis, and transformer-based models for real-time error detection and correction. Designed for seamless IDE integration, enhancing coding eﬃciency.

projects.name: Weather Detector
projects.description: Developed this project as a part of group project in College. Takes the city as User Input, which in returns a details analysis of weather of that particular city. Separated details view section for each region.

projects.name: WSN for Environmental Monitoring
projects.description: Developed a Wireless Sensor Network (WSN) simulation for environmental monitoring using an enhanced GWO-LEACH protocol in NS3. The optimized algorithm improves energy eﬃciency, load balancing, and network lifespan by dynamically selecting cluster heads based on energy and workload. Results conﬁrm superior performance over traditional LEACH, making it ideal for real-world applications.

name: Anirudh S Rai

experience.title: Intern
experience.description: Completed a 3 week training program on Flutter. Developed a Quiz App based on the popular quizzing app called QuizUp. Gained hands-on experience with Flutter’s widget-based architecture, and hot reload, while learning to build responsive and cross-platform user interfaces.

projects.name: Personal Music Streaming App
projects.description: Developed a personal music streaming app that allows users to upload, stream, and manage their own music library. Implemented secure authentication and a RESTful API to handle song metadata, streaming. Containerized the entire application using Docker and deployed it for seamless access across devices.

projects.name: Delivery App for College Students
projects.description: Built a platform where students can post and accept delivery tasks within their college. Designed a reward system where students earn points or money for completing deliveries.
